string.value: I obtained a peculiar looking book. The entire book, cover to cover, is black so I can't read it.... I'm getting a strange vibe from the book. Perhaps #b#p2081200##k will know something about this book.

#p2081200# said to go see #b#p2060100##k, the witch from the deep sea, to get information about this book. #p2060100#...? Why won't #p2081200# just tell me about the book himself? Would #p2060100# really know anything? I'm skeptical, but I have no choice...I must know more! \n\n#i4001107##t4001107# #b#c4001107# / 1#k
#p2060100# didn't know much about the book itself. However, she seemed to know #bhow to read the book#k. She understood the language, and agreed to tell me what it means upon my return.
I can feel your energy from here...What kind of question do you have, young magician...?
That book... has dangerous truth in it. Cold silence and sharp fear. The book has it. But that's what you may need...

This is a fork in the road for you. From a metaphorical point of view, you are staring into the dark abyss, my friend. You must choose your way. Stability without risk or dangerous power that may corrupt you...
Do you want to know more about #b#t04001107##k?
Yeah... You want stronger power. Are you sure? Being number one means that everyone else is after you...

There is someone who learned magic deep inside of the sea for a long time. #bWitch #p2060100##k. Go to see her. She will be able to give you the knowledge you seek. I hope you've made the right choice.
That's right. You chose stability. That can be a wise choice. Whatever you choose, I hope you don't regret it.
What has brought you here, so deep in the sea? \n... #p2081200#? Do you mean Gritto in the Forest of Priests? I wonder why such a noble magician wants to see this horrible witch...
No... I see. This mysterious energy. This is the energy from the book you have. Do you want to know about the book?
Interesting. This cold and damp energy reminds of me of death... Hmm, I'm sorry but as #p2060100# I don't know about this book. However, I know #bhow to read the book#k.
Why do you want to see me? Go away if you don't need to see me. I don't like those who can enjoy the sunlight...
